text: 17|57|Sihamte yiboraka ahbana karae sihamta nije'i sihamtara pratipalakara naikatya labhara upaya sandhana karae ye, sihamtara majata kona kimana te'omra nikatabarti haâ€™ba parae, arau sihamte te'omra daya pratyasa karae arau te'omra sastika bhaya karae. Niscaya tomara pratipalakara sasti ati bhayaraha.
